name: pdf-analyzer
title: PDF to PNG Converter
description: Convert PDF pages to high-quality PNG images using PyMuPDF
content:
Overview

This application converts PDF documents into high-quality PNG images, with one image per page. Built using PyMuPDF, it provides fast and accurate rendering of PDF content.

Features

  • Convert each page of a PDF to a separate PNG image
  • High-quality 2x resolution output
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • PDF File: Upload your PDF file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output images

Output

The application generates PNG files named pdf_page_1.png, pdf_page_2.png, etc. in the specified output directory. Each file corresponds to one page of the input PDF.

Use Cases

  • Creating image versions of PDF documents for web display
  • Extracting figures or diagrams from academic papers
  • Generating thumbnail previews of PDF content
  • Preparing PDF content for image processing workflows
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && cd $REPO_DIR/python && python pdf_analyzer.py "${pdfPath}" -o "${outputDir}" -z 2.0
